mapper.sql: ID, HEADER_ID, DETAIL_ID, TARGET_TYPE, TARGET_ID, TARGET_NAME, SYS_VALUE, BANK_VALUE, RESULT, ADDUSER, ADDTIME, REMARK, FILE_NAME
mapper.select: SELECT sys.E_INVEST_NO AS sysNo, bank.BANK_NO AS bankNo, sys.E_INVEST_STATUS AS sysStatus, bank.STATUS AS bankStatus, sys.ACCOUNT AS sysAccount, bank.MONEY AS bankAccount, 0 AS sysFee, bank.FEE AS bankFee, bank.ID AS detailId FROM rocky_b_tenderrecord sys LEFT JOIN e_recon_detail bank ON sys.E_INVEST_NO = bank.BANK_NO WHERE sys.BORROW_ID = #{borrowId} AND bank.file_name = #{filename} UNION ALL SELECT sys.E_INVEST_NO AS sysNo, bank.BANK_NO AS bankNo, sys.E_INVEST_STATUS AS sysStatus, bank.STATUS AS bankStatus, sys.ACCOUNT AS sysAccount, bank.MONEY AS bankAccount, 0 AS sysFee, bank.FEE AS bankFee, bank.ID AS detailId FROM rocky_b_tenderrecord sys RIGHT JOIN e_recon_detail bank ON sys.E_INVEST_NO = bank.BANK_NO WHERE sys.BORROW_ID = #{borrowId} AND bank.file_name = #{filename} AND sys.BIZ_INVEST_NO IS NULL

SELECT sys.E_Repayment_No AS sysNo, bank.BANK_NO AS bankNo, sys.E_Repayment_Status AS sysStatus, bank.STATUS AS bankStatus, sys.REPAY_YESACCOUNT AS sysAccount, bank.MONEY AS bankAccount, 0 AS sysFee, bank.FEE AS bankFee FROM rocky_b_collectionrecord sys LEFT JOIN e_recon_detail bank ON sys.E_Repayment_No = bank.BANK_NO WHERE sys.BORROW_ID = #{borrowId} AND sys.STATUS = 4 AND bank.file_name = #{filename} UNION ALL SELECT sys.E_Repayment_No AS sysNo, bank.BANK_NO AS bankNo, sys.E_Repayment_Status AS sysStatus, bank.STATUS AS bankStatus, sys.REPAY_YESACCOUNT AS sysAccount, bank.MONEY AS bankAccount, 0 AS sysFee, bank.FEE AS bankFee FROM rocky_b_collectionrecord sys RIGHT JOIN e_recon_detail bank ON sys.E_Repayment_No = bank.BANK_NO WHERE sys.BORROW_ID = #{borrowId} AND sys.STATUS = 4 AND bank.file_name = #{filename} AND sys.E_Repayment_No IS NULL
mapper.insert: insert into e_recon_detail_result (ID, HEADER_ID, DETAIL_ID, TARGET_TYPE, TARGET_ID, TARGET_NAME, SYS_VALUE, BANK_VALUE, RESULT, ADDUSER, ADDTIME, REMARK, FILE_NAME) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{headerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{detailId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{targetType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{targetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{targetName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{result,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{adduser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into e_recon_detail_result
ID,
HEADER_ID,
DETAIL_ID,
TARGET_TYPE,
TARGET_ID,
TARGET_NAME,
SYS_VALUE,
BANK_VALUE,
RESULT,
ADDUSER,
ADDTIME,
REMARK,
FILE_NAME,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{headerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{detailId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{targetType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{targetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{targetName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sysValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{bankValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{result,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{adduser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
now(),
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update e_recon_detail_result
HEADER_ID = #{headerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DETAIL_ID = #{detailId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TARGET_TYPE = #{targetType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
TARGET_ID = #{targetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TARGET_NAME = #{targetName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYS_VALUE = #{sysValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANK_VALUE = #{bankValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESULT = #{result,jdbcType=TINYINT},
ADDUSER = #{adduser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ADDTIME = #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILE_NAME = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update e_recon_detail_result set HEADER_ID = #{headerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DETAIL_ID = #{detailId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TARGET_TYPE = #{targetType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, TARGET_ID = #{targetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TARGET_NAME = #{targetName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYS_VALUE = #{sysValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANK_VALUE = #{bankValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESULT = #{result,jdbcType=TINYINT}, ADDUSER = #{adduser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ADDTIME = #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_NAME = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
